relation: Good grub in the student center and cafeteria. All vending machines are alike, so you know how that is.

There are a lot of cool clubs and groups to get into that will boost your academic career into overdrive. Better study habits, no more missing homework assignments and better grades! One club is called MESA.
See a counselor early and ask all of the questions you could possibly think of right off the bat.

Hartnell is a great school to begin a career in any STEM field, as well as any other field of study. The school offers plenty of good resources to accommodate the students' needs and is continuing to renovate our school to meet the green energy requirements.
pageTitle: Hartnell College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Sofia from Soledad, CA 09/06/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 33 Categories Comments Tips for prospective students Be ready to learn, choose your classes carefully, and enjoy your time here because time passes by so quickly. Am enjoying being here I have made great friends, the staff is friendly, and the student area is very comfortable to be in. Am learning a lot Since I started attending Hartnell, I have only had the best instructors who love what they do, and share it.
